definition: see 月下花前[yue4 xia4 hua1 qian2]
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
surname Hua
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
moon/month/monthly/CL:個|个[ge4],輪|轮[lun2]
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: You never take notes in a love affair.
sentences.chinese: 你花前月下時從不做筆記。

sentences.english: After supper, walking by the flowers and under the moon has a unique lingering charm .
sentences.chinese: 晚飯後，在花前月下散步別有一番韻味。

sentences.english: Poetry is not just on the next Kamiyanagi.
sentences.chinese: 也不只是詩詞中的月上柳梢頭的花前月下。
